BATTLESHIP

Designed by Ngodi Albert

Battleship is played by the User against the Computer

  1. The game starts by the User clicking on the control panel button
  2. The User positions his ships
  3. Click on the start game button
  4. Attack opponent's ships by clicking on the target position on the gameboard
  5. A ship is sunk when all it's positions are hit by the attacker
  6. The game ends and the winner is announced when all the ships of either players are sunk.
